titleStmt.title: Seven sermons preached by the Right Reverend Father in God, Seth Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

notesStmt.note: Each sermon, except the first, has special t.p. The second through fourth have imprint: Printed by A.C. for James Collins, 1672; the fifth and sixth have imprint: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for James Collins, 1672; the seventh has same imprint as fourth through sixth, but is dated 1674, and has separate paging.
Advertisements: p. [1]-[2] of third count, and p. 97 of fourth count.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

Against resistance of lawful powers -- Against the antiscripturists -- Concerning the sinfulness, danger & remedies of infidelity -- A sermon preached before the Peers, in the Abby-Church of Westminster: October 10th M.DC.LXVI-- A sermon concerning the strangeness, frequency, and desperate consequence of impenitency -- A sermon against ingratitude -- An apology for the mysteries of the Gospel.
